name: Hello WebXR
description: Made to commemorate the release of the WebXR 1.0 API, showcases some of what's possible with WebXR.

name: Moonrider
description: A rhythm game built by Supermedium similar to Beat Saber.

name: Plockle
description: A spatial block puzzle game with over 40 levels.

name: Castle Builder
description: A collaborative and cross-platform castle-building game utilizing a unique Unity-to-three.js pipeline.

name: Prehistoric Domain
description: A Jurassic Park-esque experience in the browser, with multiple dinosaur exhibits available and more planned for the future.

name: Above Par-adowski WebXR Mini Golf
description: A WebXR minigolf game designed by Paradowski Creative, featuring 9 holes spread across a unique and varied environment.

name: Yolopia
description: A rhythm game which combines flow, boxing and pose matching.

name: f60
description: A cross-platform WebXR escape room series set within a Soviet prison.

name: Brushwork VR
description: A VR app that simulates the process of painting with a virtual canvas, palette, color mixing, and more.

name: SoulPaint
description: A VR app that provides you with 3D drawing tools and a virtual body to illustrate lived experiences.

name: Obscura
description: Float around and explore a structure inspired by the architecture of Carlo Scarpa.

name: Silk Brush
description: A port of Tilt Brush to WebXR with plans for future extensions.

name: VARTISTE
description: A VR app for 2D drawing and image editing, and 3D model texturing.

name: beats
description: A semi-collaborative app with various rooms where anyone can create or modify an existing musical loop.

name: Fathom VR
description: A WebXR version of the music discovery app Fathom, which lets you search for and explore clouds of related artists with spatialized audio.

name: TRACK
description: A linear ride through an immersive audiovisual experience developed by Little Workshop.

name: Exokit Avatars
description: A web-based avatar system that can load humanoid avatars in multiple different model formats and features arm+leg IK, facial animation via visemes, and more. The original repo is no longer maintained, but there is a more up-to-date fork available here.

name: ReadyPlayerMe
description: Lets you quickly and easily create a 3D avatar online that you can download in glTF format.

name: VRoid
description: Lets you create anime-styled 3D avatars that export to the highly-compatible .vrm format.

name: Metaverse Makers Discord
description: Official server for M3, the Metaverse Makers Mastermind group.

name: WebXR Discord
description: Official Discord server for all things WebXR, with over 1000 members.

name: WebXR Francophone Discord
description: French-speaking Discord server for WebXR.

name: Wonderland Engine Discord
description: Wonderland Engine Discord server.

name: XR Foundation Discord
description: Official server for XR Foundation, responsible for XREngine and various other metaverse-related projects.

name: Zesty Market Discord
description: Official server for Zesty Market.

name: Immersive Web
description: Oldest WebXR-related group, originally made for WebVR.

name: WebXR
description: Slightly newer WebXR-centric group.

name: WebXR Korea
description: Korean WebXR group created by Belivvr.

name: WebXR Paris
description: Companion to the WebXR Paris group on Meetup.

name: Babylon.js Forum
description: Official Babylon.js forum.

name: three.js Forum
description: Official three.js forum.

name: PlayCanvas Forum
description: Official PlayCanvas forum.

name: WebXR Community Forum
description: Official forum for all things WebXR. Sister community to the WebXR Discord.

name: r/WebVR
description: Initially the main subreddit for WebVR discussion, now features general WebXR content along with r/WebXR.

name: r/WonderlandEngine
description: Wonderland Engine subreddit.

name: Active Replica
description: Offers virtual event hosting through Mozilla Hubs.

name: Active Theory
description: Developed the Dreamwave platform.

name: Aircards
description: WebAR advertising/marketing agency.

name: Hatsumi
description: A design studio developing experiences at the intersection of healthcare and art.

name: Immers Space
description: A Distributed Cooperative Organization (DisCO) focused on enabling open and federated immersive web content.

name: Laguna Labs
description: Immersive web tech agency.

name: MetaVRse
description: Enterprise-focused metaverse creation company. Parent company of MetaVRse Engine, MetaVRse Studio, and MetaVRse Properties such as TheMall.

name: Playko Software
description: VR/AR/WebXR agency and WebXR game development studio.

name: REM5
description: Digital immersive experience design studio specializing in education and social equity initiatives.

name: Sketchfab
description: 3D model marketplace that offers a VR previewer.

name: Vhite Rabbit
description: Parent company behind Construct Arcade.

name: 2WSZ
description: An aggregator for WebXR content featuring ratings, a recommendation system, and both English and Korean language support.

name: Extended Collection
description: A curated library of links to the Immersive Web maintained by vrhermit.

name: heyVR
description: A curated platform for publishing WebXR games.

name: PICO Browser Start Page
description: The default start page for PICO Browser.

name: XR Swim
description: An aggregator site for both WebXR and Web3 content.

name: Wolvic Start Page
description: The default start page for the Wolvic browser.

name: Ethereal Engine
description: A full stack MMO engine built on three.js and bitECS with support for WebXR.

name: Godot
description: A cross-platform, open-source engine with WebXR support as of version 3.2.4.

name: MetaVRse Engine
description: Web-based tool designed to make XR and 3D content creation. No-code/low-code template system, automatic embedding for business and education.

name: Needle
description: An engine and exporter for Blender and Unity.

name: nunuStudio
description: A multiplatform, open-source engine built on three.js that can be used natively or in the browser.

name: PlayCanvas
description: A browser-based WebGL engine with support for WebXR content, mobile browsers, collaborative editing, and more.

name: Rogue Engine
description: An HTML5 Game Engine based on Three.js and TypeScript.

name: Unity
description: A highly popular game engine with community packages that enable content to be exported for WebXR.

name: WebXR Export
description: Exporter by De-Panther

name: SimpleWebXR
description: Exporter by Rufus31415

name: Wonderland Engine
description: A development platform designed specifically for building WebXR applications.

name: A-Frame
description: Lets you create VR experiences using declarative HTML and custom JavaScript components built on top of three.js.

name: Babylon.js
description: A powerful and feature-rich rendering engine packaged into a JavaScript framework.

name: JanusWeb
description: An in-browser implementation of JanusVR that lets you build social VR experiences.

name: p5.xr
description: An add-on for the library p5.js that allows you to create immersive p5 sketches.

name: react-three-fiber
description: A React renderer for three.js. Additional WebXR-specific hooks and components are available in React XR as well.

name: Spaces VR
description: A front end framework for quickly creating VR websites built on react-three-fiber.

name: three.js
description: A JavaScript library for rendering 3D content with WebGL that powers many existing WebXR experiences and tools.

name: X3DOM
description: A framework for integrating and manipulating X3D scenes as HTML5/DOM elements.

name: Verge3D
description: A toolkit that allows 3D artists to export their scenes and create immersive web experiences with ease.

name: Learn A-Frame (VR)
description: A roughly 6-hour Codecademy course written in partnership with A-Frame.

name: babylon.js Guided Learning
description: Detailed text and video tutorials that complement the other instructional pages in the documentation.

name: Zesty Market
description: A marketplace for rentable banner spaces in XR. Offers integrations with most major WebXR creation tools.

name: Dreamwave
description: A web-based platform for hosting scalable virtual events. Powered the virtual music festival Secret Sky 2021.

name: Emerald City
description: A virtual event space developed by Hub Culture.

name: FRAME
description: A platform focused on enabling easy 3D collaborations in a virtual space.

name: Hubs
description: Mozilla's platform for enabling users to gather and collaborate virtually.

name: 3XR
description: A project by microchipgnu that has integrated with Mintbase to create virtual galleries for NFT artwork on NEAR.

name: glry.xyz
description: A site that hosts virtual galleries for NFT art on the Tezos blockchain.

name: oncyber
description: Offers both free and collectible gallery spaces to display NFTs across multiple different chains.

name: RareRooms
description: Allows you to create immersive NFT galleries with support for multiple different chains/marketplaces.

name: Voxels
description: A virtual world powered by Ethereum where players can buy land, build stores, display art, and more.

name: Hyperfy
description: A platform hosting up to 10,000 customizable, cross-platform, and immersive virtual worlds. Built on three.js, powered by Ethereum.

name: Ozone Metaverse
description: A spatial computing cloud platform offering world creation tools with Web3 integrations and monetization.

name: Raspberry Dream Land
description: A progressive events platform focused on inclusivity, radical self-expression, and virtual relationships. Also has its own NFT avatar collection.

name: Somnium Space Web
description: A web viewer that allows you to explore parcels from Somnium Space in your browser, with VR support on the Oculus Quest browser.

name: vrland
description: A platform for gathering and virtual showcases that supports displaying of NFTs.

name: M3
description: Official M3 channel.

name: Sorskoot
description: Tutorials and other WebXR related content.

name: WebXR
description: Official WebXR channel.

name: WebXR Summit Series
description: Contains clips, VODs, and other videos from the WebXR Summit Series.

name: Wonderland Engine
description: Official Wonderland Engine channel.
